title: New: Formation – Hangin
content:
Having impressed at The Great Escape, as well as a set at BBC’s Big Weekend, London duo Formation return with their best track yet, in the form of Hangin.

Bridging the gap between festival favourite and indie dancefloor singalong, it’s further indication that Formation are one of the UK’s most exciting new artists. Check it out below.

Follow our Spotify On Repeat playlist for a hand-picked selection of the current hottest tracks.
author: 5e9b68b27a1236eccfeb1d27
